transcript: four types of Leverage that you can employ in a business and this is directly from Nal ricot the first level is labor so you can get other people to do work for you like you were doing something someone else does it now you don't have to do it that's leverage you get more done for your time the second level of Leverage is capital so that's you asking for other people's money other people spent their time to make the money and then you use that money to make money as well and you get a percentage of that gain but you didn't have to incur the cost of time to go get the money third and fourth is code and media code being software so if you write something once people can use it that's leverage you put one input and you get infinite output media to the same degree I'm recording this video right now I record it once and a million people can see it
